overview: This is a story about how war brings destruction not only to the homes of the occupied territories, but also to the families and destinies of those who carry this war to a foreign land. A young Russian officer, an artilleryman, a veteran of the war in Ukraine returns to his homeland. And discovers an empty house. Trying to find loved ones, he realizes that his little world has been destroyed by him. He talks to his family photo and tries to justify himself by explaining why he bombed peaceful cities of another country.
title: Dad's Here
